name: PostalAddress
description: The PostalAddress class specifies a postal address formatted according to the POSTAL data type (Section 2.11).

meaning.name: meaning
meaning.description: A free-form description of the element content.

lang.name: lang
lang.description: A valid language code per RFC 4646 [7] constrained by the definition of "xs:language".  The interpretation of this code is described in Section 6.
